content:
There's a lot to consider when it comes to optimizing your daily commute. It's great that you're thinking about making changes to save money and simplify your routine.

Packing your own coffee is a fantastic idea! $60-90 per month is a significant saving, and it's a relatively easy change to make. You can also consider exploring different types of coffee makers or brewing methods to find one that works best for you.

Since you're happy with your current train route, we can focus on the monthly pass and coffee savings for now. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.

What's your next step in getting a monthly pass? Are you going to visit the transit agency's website or visit a physical location to purchase one?
